Fishermen's Guild Member: Around the Dwarven Village,if you hunt *elder longtail keltirs, black wolves, Utuku Orc grunts, goblin brigand lieutenants, darkstone golems, boogle ratmen and pitchstone golems*, you can get the sweet aromatic fluid the water spirits love.
